description: Store any file seamlessly on JigsawStack File Storage and use it in your AI applications.         Supports various file types including images, documents, and more.

inputs.name: api_key
inputs.info: Your JigsawStack API key for authentication

inputs.name: file
inputs.info: Upload file to be stored on JigsawStack File Storage.

inputs.name: key
inputs.info: The key used to store the file on JigsawStack File Storage.                 If not provided, a unique key will be generated.

inputs.name: overwrite
inputs.info: If true, will overwrite the existing file with the same key.                 If false, will return an error if the file already exists.

inputs.name: temp_public_url
inputs.info: If true, will return a temporary public URL which lasts for a limited time.                 If false, will return the file store key which can only be accessed by the owner.
